sn22.157:1.2: “Kismiṁ nu kho, bhikkhave, sati, kiṁ upādāya, kiṁ abhinivissa uppajjanti saṁyojanābhinivesavinibandhā”ti?
sn22.157:1.4: “rūpe kho, bhikkhave, sati, rūpaṁ upādāya, rūpaṁ abhinivissa uppajjanti saṁyojanābhinivesavinibandhā.
sn22.157:1.8: viññāṇe sati, viññāṇaṁ upādāya, viññāṇaṁ abhinivissa uppajjanti saṁyojanābhinivesavinibandhā.
sn22.157:1.13: api nu taṁ anupādāya uppajjeyyuṁ saṁyojanābhinivesavinibandhā”ti?
